thread.title: Results are in for three Blue Jackets Rewind Games to air next week on FOX Sports Ohio
thread.title_full: Results are in for three Blue Jackets Rewind Games to air next week on FOX Sports Ohio

title: Results are in for three Blue Jackets Rewind Games to air next week on FOX Sports Ohio
text:
Results are in for three Blue Jackets Rewind Games to air next week on FOX Sports Ohio FOX Sports Ohio 
Oct 1, 2015 at 5:55p ET + Updated Oct 1, 2015 at 6:01p ET 
COLUMBUS, OH -- As we get ready for Columbus Blue Jackets Opening Night next week , FOX Sports Ohio completes its "Countdown to Face-Off," presented by Wendy's, with the airing next week of three final fan-selected memorable Blue Jackets Rewind gamesfrom the 2014-15 season. 
Fans were given the opportunity to vote online for their favorite game from last season and the results are in! Below are the games that were selected by fans with air dates and times on FOX Sports Ohio. Each will be preceded by a half-hour Blue Jackets Live â Preseason Edition . 
Tuesday, October 6 at 7:30 p.m. Blue Jackets 5-3 win v. Anaheim from March 24, 2015 Scott Hartnell with CBJ's first hat trick in two years vs. one of West's best 
Wednesday, October 7 at 10:00 p.m. Blue Jackets 5-3 win v. Pittsburgh from April 4, 2015 Foligno's hat trick leads to victory after trailing 2-0 
Thursday, October 8 at 10:00 p.m. Blue Jackets 5-4 SO win v. Islanders from April 11, 2015 Six third period goals and CBJ trailed 3-1 and 4-3 before closing out Nassau Coliseum (regular season) with a shootout win 
Like FOX Sports Ohio on Facebook and follow on Twitter @FOXSportsOH for updates on Jackets preseason coverage #CBJCountdown #CBJ 
FOX Sports Ohio's regular season coverage of the Blue Jackets begins on Friday, Oct. 9 when the team opens the 2015-16 season at Nationwide Arena with a 7:00 p.m. matchup against the New York Rangers. Coverage will begin at 6:00 p.m. with a special one-hour Blue Jackets Live pregame show featuring highlights, player interviews and analysis. 
Follow the FOX Sports Ohio Blue Jackets broadcast team on Twitter: o Jody Shelley â @shelleyhawk45 o Jeff Rimer - @JRimerCBJ
